33a6(nyi khri): smig rgyu lta bu'i chos dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i chos rnams yongs su shes pa dang / de ltar yongs su shes pas/ byang chub sems
33a7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su
33b1(nyi khri): / mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
33b2(nyi khri): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam
33b3(nyi khri): rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi
33b4(nyi khri): byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes pas rlom sems su mi
33b5(nyi khri): byed/ rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// sprul pa'i bar
33b6(nyi khri): du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rlom sems
33b7(nyi khri): su mi byed/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas rlom sems su mi byed/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rlom sems su mi byed na/ re rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis
34a1(nyi khri): rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom
34a2(nyi khri): sems su mi byed do/ / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rlom sems su mi byed/ byang chub kyi
34a3(nyi khri): phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed
34a4(nyi khri): rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom
34a5(nyi khri): sems su mi byed do/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par
34a6(nyi khri): thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams rlom
34a7(nyi khri): sems su mi byed/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mngon par shes pa rnams la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam
34b1(nyi khri): gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi
34b2(nyi khri): byed do/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams rlom sems su mi byed/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rlom sems su mi
34b3(nyi khri): byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom
34b4(nyi khri): sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa
34b5(nyi khri): chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rlom sems su mi byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis rlom sems su mi byed/
34b6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do//
34b7(nyi khri): sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rlob sems su
35a1(nyi khri): mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems
35a2(nyi khri): su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// sprul pa'i bar du rnam sems su mi byed/ sprul pa'i rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa
35a3(nyi khri): rlom sems su mi byed do/ / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum
35a4(nyi khri): cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nya phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /
35a5(nyi khri): gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor zhing / bcom
35a6(nyi khri): ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas rgyal po chen
35a7(nyi khri): po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ shar phyogs
35b1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
35b2(nyi khri): 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs
35b3(nyi khri): su dri ba sems kyis mthong bar gyur to/ / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs
35b4(nyi khri): kyi phyogs re re zhing / sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha
35b5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u
35b6(nyi khri): 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su dri ba sems kyis mthong bar gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
35b7(nyi khri): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
36a1(nyi khri): te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur ro// gang yang bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
36a2(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba de dag kyang sa phyogs 'di nyid du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha
36a3(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang dang / rtags gang dang / mtshan ma gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems
36a4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par
36a5(nyi khri): 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'di la rab 'byor byang chub
36a6(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya
36a7(nyi khri): bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ / gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ gzugs sdug
36b1(nyi khri): ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs bcings zhes bya ba/
36b2(nyi khri): 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs 'das zhes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// tshor
36b3(nyi khri): pa dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug
36b4(nyi khri): bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston
36b5(nyi khri): par mi 'gyur ro/ / rnam par shes pa zhi zhe bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos
36b6(nyi khri): ston par mi 'gyur ro/ / rnam par shes pa 'das shes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byeng zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// skye mched dang / khams
36b7(nyi khri): dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal
37a1(nyi khri): zhes bya ba 'am/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sdug ces bya ba 'am/
37a2(nyi khri): mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rten cing 'brel par 'byung
37a3(nyi khri): ba bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'das shes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba 'am/ de ltar byung zhes
37a4(nyi khri): bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces
37a5(nyi khri): bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun
37a6(nyi khri): bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub
37a7(nyi khri): kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdud zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bcings zhes bya ba 'am
37b1(nyi khri): grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun 'das zhes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston
37b2(nyi khri): par mi 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par
37b3(nyi khri): thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces
37b4(nyi khri): byab 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams bdag
37b5(nyi khri): ceces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams zhe nas
37b6(nyi khri): bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// mngon par shes
37b7(nyi khri): pa rnams 'das zhes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces
38a1(nyi khri): bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams
38a2(nyi khri): bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bya ba
38a3(nyi khri): 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams bcing shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'das
38a4(nyi khri): shes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs shes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /
38a5(nyi khri): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
38a6(nyi khri): pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
38a7(nyi khri): 'dres pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par
38b1(nyi khri): mi 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'das zhes bya
38b2(nyi khri): baba'am/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar
38b3(nyi khri): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am
38b4(nyi khri): bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zhi
38b5(nyi khri): zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//
38b6(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'dus zhes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom
38b7(nyi khri): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos ni ji ltar
39a1(nyi khri): ston par 'gyur/ ston ni ci zhig ston par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par/
39a2(nyi khri): dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par
39a3(nyi khri): 'gyur ro/ / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa
39a4(nyi khri): rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// 'phag
39a5(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar
39a6(nyi khri): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu
39a7(nyi khri): rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs
39b1(nyi khri): pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
39b2(nyi khri): pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam
39b3(nyi khri): par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
39b4(nyi khri): pa/ rab 'byor gzugs yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs
39b5(nyi khri): su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'i phyir/
39b6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su dag
39b7(nyi khri): pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
40a1(nyi khri): pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon
40a2(nyi khri): par shes pa rnams yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su
40a3(nyi khri): dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig
40a4(nyi khri): pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o//
40a5(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na
40a6(nyi khri): gzugs yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su
40a7(nyi khri): dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab
40b1(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su dag
40b2(nyi khri): pa'i slad du/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
40b3(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa
40b4(nyi khri): rnams yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi
40b5(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying
40b6(nyi khri): rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad
40b7(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
41a1(nyi khri): bzugs la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzugs yongs su dag pa'o//
41a2(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni
41a3(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med
41a4(nyi khri): dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
41a5(nyi khri): chos sum cu rtsa bdun la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs
41a6(nyi khri): su dag pa'o/ / 'phags po'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa
41a7(nyi khri): rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la skye ba med
41b1(nyi khri): pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su dag pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
41b2(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su dag pa'o//
41b3(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
41b4(nyi khri): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
41b5(nyi khri): yongs su dag pa'o/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam pa thams cad
41b6(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa
41b7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
42a1(nyi khri): skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' yongs su dag pa ste/ rab 'byor//
42a2(nyi khri): nam mkha' la 'gro ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' la 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes
42a3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dang / rab 'byor nam mkha' la gzung du med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
42a4(nyi khri): pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / rab 'byor nam mkha' la tha snyad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam
42a5(nyi khri): mkha' la tha snyad ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na
42a6(nyi khri): nam mkha' la sgra brnyan gnyis kyi sgra ltar nam mkha' la tha snyad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i
42a7(nyi khri): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' brjod du ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
42b1(nyi khri): phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la ni gang yang brjod du med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du nam mkha' brjod du
42b2(nyi khri): med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
42b3(nyi khri): dag pa'o/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan
42b4(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la gang yang dmigs su med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha
42b5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par
42b6(nyi khri): byang ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma
42b7(nyi khri): mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das
43a1(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab
43a2(nyi khri): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang
43a3(nyi khri): kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de la mig gi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i nad dang / lce'i nad dang / lus
43a4(nyi khri): kyi nang dang / yid kyi nang dang / yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro// lus ngan par mi 'gyur ro// rgas pas 'khogs pa'i lus su mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
43a5(nyi khri): kyi bu mo de ni mi bde ba mi spong bas dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ / de'i slad bzhin du lha brgya stong mang po 'brang bar 'gyur te/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang
43a6(nyi khri): ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du khrung bar 'gyur ro/ / gang na chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa der yang tshes brgyad
43a7(nyi khri): dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la lha'i tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa'i tshe/ bsod
43b1(nyi khri): nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu mang ba tshad ma mchis pa/ grangs ma mchis pa/ bsam gyis mi
43b2(nyi khri): khyab pa/ mtshungs pa ma mchis pa/ gzhal du ma mchis pa/ dpag tu ma mchis pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de
43b3(nyi khri): de bzhin no/ / de de zhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lha'i 'khor gyi mdun
43b4(nyi khri): du ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel te/ bsod nams kyi phung po mang ba/ tshad med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa
43b5(nyi khri): mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ dpag tu med pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po
43b6(nyi khri): che'o/ / rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni 'di yin te/ sems can dmyal pa las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o// byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin
43b7(nyi khri): rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi dang lha dbul po las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o// rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o// bram ze'i rigs tsha zhing mtho ba'i rigs
44a1(nyi khri): 'byin pa'o/ / khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// 'du shes med 'du shes med min//
44a2(nyi khri): skye mched kyi bar gyi lha'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o// dgra
44a3(nyi khri): bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub 'byin pa'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i
44a4(nyi khri): las kyi lam rgyas par bstan te/ de la bslabs pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba
44a5(nyi khri): ba rnams yod do/ / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha
44a6(nyi khri): rnams yod do/ / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang /
44a7(nyi khri): dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med tsha ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu
44b1(nyi khri): mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med//
44b2(nyi khri): pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i
44b3(nyi khri): 'bras bu yod do/ / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub yod do// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yod na/ bsam
44b4(nyi khri): gtan bzhi yod do/ / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yod do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
44b5(nyi khri): phyin pa yod do/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
44b6(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ / nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod do//
44b7(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar
45a1(nyi khri): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yod do//
45a2(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
45a3(nyi khri): dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod do// de
45a4(nyi khri): yang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos de thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de la bslabs na rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing
45a5(nyi khri): mtho ba rnams yod do/ / khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal tshan bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan
45a6(nyi khri): dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chu snang dang /
45a7(nyi khri): tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba
45b1(nyi khri): dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha'
45b2(nyi khri): yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba
45b3(nyi khri): dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs
45b4(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ / de bas na de ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che zhes bya'o// pha rol phyin pa rin po che de la ni chos gang yang skye
45b5(nyi khri): ba'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ yongs su gzung ba 'am/ dor ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang skye ba
45b6(nyi khri): 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ yongs su gzung ba 'am/ dor bar bya ba'i chos de lta bu med do// rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po
45b7(nyi khri): tshe 'di la ni dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ 'jig rten pa 'am// 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa med pa 'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang
46a1(nyi khri): yang dmigs su med de/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni dmigs su med do// rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che la ni chos
46a2(nyi khri): gang gis kyang 'go ba med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang 'go bar gyur pa'i chos de lta bu dmigs su med de/ rab 'byor de'i phyir na pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'go ba
46a3(nyi khri): med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che'o/ / rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar 'du shes par yang
46a4(nyi khri): mi byed la/ de ltar mi rtog cing / de ltar mi dmigs te/ de ltar 'phro ba yang mi byed na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom
46a5(nyi khri): pa'o/ / de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par bsams shing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
46a6(nyi khri): la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ sems can yongs su
46a7(nyi khri): smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
46b1(nyi khri): chos gang yang ston pa 'am/ rnam par ston pa 'am/ yongs su ston pa 'am/ 'dzin par byed pa 'am/ 'byin par byed pa 'am/ skye bar byed pa 'am/ 'gag par byed pa
46b2(nyi khri): 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar byed pa 'am/ 'grib par byed pa 'am/ 'phel bar byed pa 'am/ 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar
46b3(nyi khri): byung bar byed pa med do/ / rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin//
46b4(nyi khri): gzugs kyi khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin no//
46b5(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / btson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang //
46b6(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ snang stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i
46b7(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /
47a1(nyi khri): bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam par thar pa
47a2(nyi khri): dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams
47a3(nyi khri): sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin
47a4(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi
47a5(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong
47a6(nyi khri): ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rang byang chub sgrub pa ma yin// 'dor ba ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/
47a7(nyi khri): 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa bamatshan
47b1(nyi khri): gcig pa/ / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor ba ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams sgrub pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin//
47b2(nyi khri): gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung / chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med
47b3(nyi khri): pa de ni de bzhin du gnas pa yin te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par sangs rgyas so// mngon par thugs su chud do// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mngon par
47b4(nyi khri): thugs su chud nas kyang gsung ngo / / ston to// brjod do// 'grel to// rnam par 'byed do// yang dag par gsal bar mdzad do// yang dag par ston to// de nas lha'i
47b5(nyi khri): bu stong phrag mang po steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/ lhung lhung ldegs kyi sku phyung ste/ lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu ta dang / puN+Da ri ka dang / man+da ra ba dang
47b6(nyi khri): man+da ra ba chen po 'thor zhing 'di skad kyi tshig brjod par gyur to/ / kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pas/ lha'i bu stong phrag du ma skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa skyes par gyur
47b7(nyi khri): te/ 'dzam bu gling du chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor ba mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
48a1(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bskor ba yang ma yin// gcig tu bskor ba yang ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha
48a2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa 'di yang chos gang la yang 'khor ba 'am/ mi 'khor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
48a3(nyi khri): pa 'di chos gang la yang 'khor bar bgyi ba 'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar mi gnas pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
48a4(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
48a5(nyi khri): dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid
48a6(nyi khri): kyis stong ngo / / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
48a7(nyi khri): kyis stong ngo / / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags
48b1(nyi khri): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ngo / / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang /
48b2(nyi khri): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
48b3(nyi khri): pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo // ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams
48b4(nyi khri): kyis stong ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang // byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen
48b5(nyi khri): po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo //
48b6(nyi khri): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo // dgra bcom pa nyid dgra
48b7(nyi khri): bcom pa nyid kyis stong ngo / / rang byang chub rang byang chub kyis stong ngo // lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
49a1(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo / / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol
49a2(nyi khri): tu phyin pa 'di ni chen po ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de ni chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis stong ngo // byang chub sems dpa'
49a3(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya yang
49a4(nyi khri): chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis/ chos kyi 'khor lo yang bskor la/ chos gang yang 'khor ba 'am/ mi 'khor ba 'am/ rab tu 'khor bar bgyis
49a5(nyi khri): pa ma mchis te/ de dag ni chos gang yang yongs su mthong ba 'am/ yongs su ma mthong ba ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang 'khor bar bgyi ba 'am/ mi
49a6(nyi khri): 'khor bar bgyi ba 'am/ rab tu 'khor bar bgyi ba'i chos de lta bu dmigs su ma mchis te/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad kyang shin tu mngon par ma grub pa'o// de ci'i slad
49a7(nyi khri): du zhe na/ stong pa nyid ni 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so// mtshan ma ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags
49b1(nyi khri): so/ / smon pa ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so// de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / bsgrags
49b2(nyi khri): pa dang / rab tu dgod pa dang / gzhag pa dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / rnam par dgrol ba dang / smos pa dang / gsol bar bgyi ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni shes rab
49b3(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yongs su dag pa'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa de yang sus kyang ma bstan/ sus kyang ma bzung ngo // gang sus kyang ma bstan/ sus kyang ma
49b4(nyi khri): bzung ba de ni/ sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis so// gang sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis pa de la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ma mchis te/ chos bstan pa 'di la gang su yang sbyin pa'i gnas
49b5(nyi khri): su 'gyur ba ma mchis so/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u nyi shu brgyad // // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan
49b6(nyi khri): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
49b7(nyi khri): nam mkha' med pa'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
50a1(nyi khri): stsal pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par dben pa'i pha rol/
50a2(nyi khri): tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
50a3(nyi khri): 'di ni thub pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
50a4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gnas ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ming dang lus med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
50a5(nyi khri): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba med pa'i phyir ro//
50a6(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brjod du ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par
50a7(nyi khri): rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin
50b1(nyi khri): ba'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
50b2(nyi khri): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i
50b3(nyi khri): phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'phrogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
50b4(nyi khri): chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skad cig pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// /
50b5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad byang zhing zad pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skye ba
50b6(nyi khri): ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
50b7(nyi khri): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byed pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byed pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//
51a1(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
51a2(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ shes pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'pho ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu
51a3(nyi khri): phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chi ba dang skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
51a4(nyi khri): phyin pa 'di ni 'jig pa me mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
51a5(nyi khri): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rmi lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rmi lam mthong ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//
51a6(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgra brnyan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyan pa dang sgrar brjod
51a7(nyi khri): pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mig yor gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
51b1(nyi khri): stsal pa/ me long gi bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smig rgyu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
51b2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu 'bab pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma'i pha
51b3(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshan ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
51b4(nyi khri): phyin pa 'di ni smongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom
51b5(nyi khri): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon
51b6(nyi khri): mings pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
51b7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dmigs su ma mchis//
52a1(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste
52a2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro//
52a3(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rlom
52a4(nyi khri): sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi g.yo ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom
52a5(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral
52a6(nyi khri): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ma nor ba yang dag pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa
52a7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas ldang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam
52b1(nyi khri): par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
52b2(nyi khri): pa chos thams cad mtshan ma med cing dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags ma mchis pa'i
52b3(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
52b4(nyi khri): phyin pa 'di ni zhe sdang ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhe sdang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
52b5(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchi pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad sel ba'i phyir ro//
52b6(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
52b7(nyi khri): yongs su rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
53a1(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ sems can med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rab tu spangs pa'i pha rol
53a2(nyi khri): tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
53a3(nyi khri): phyin pa 'di ni mtha' gnyis su mi 'gyur ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' rnam par spong ba'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
53a4(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tha mi dang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'dres pa med pa'i phyir ro//
53a5(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyams pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan
53a6(nyi khri): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar byed pa'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i
53a7(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
53b1(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi tshad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/
53b2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad chags pa med
53b3(nyi khri): ba'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi rtag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
53b4(nyi khri): chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sdug bsngal ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom
53b5(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad tshol ba'i sbyor ba med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag
53b6(nyi khri): ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mngon par chags pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
53b7(nyi khri): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i
54a1(nyi khri): phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan
54a2(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nang stong pa
54a3(nyi khri): nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang gi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
54a4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi'i chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
54a5(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi nang gi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//
54a6(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa
54a7(nyi khri): nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan
54b1(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa
54b2(nyi khri): nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
54b3(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/
54b4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus ma byas stong pa
54b5(nyi khri): nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom
54b6(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
54b7(nyi khri): ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/
55a1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
55a2(nyi khri): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
55a3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
55a4(nyi khri): pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi nang gi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
55a5(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi
55a6(nyi khri): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi
55a7(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi
55b1(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i chos nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
55b2(nyi khri): ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
55b3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su
55b4(nyi khri): med pa'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
55b5(nyi khri): pa lus dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yang dag par
55b6(nyi khri): spong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
55b7(nyi khri): kyi pha rol rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/
56a1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dbang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbang po lnga dmigs su
56a2(nyi khri): med pa'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs lnga
56a3(nyi khri): dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
56a4(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
56a5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigasasu med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
56a6(nyi khri): pa 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / rnam par dben pa'i rnam pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/
56a7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dmigs su med
56b1(nyi khri): pa'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smon pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon pa
56b2(nyi khri): dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
56b3(nyi khri): pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i
56b4(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
56b5(nyi khri): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin pa dang / ser sna dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol
56b6(nyi khri): pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims
56b7(nyi khri): ngan pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
57a1(nyi khri): stsal pa/ gnod sems dang / bzod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brtson
57a2(nyi khri): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ le lo dang / brtson 'grus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
57a3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bsam gtan dang / 'khrug pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/
57a4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes rab 'chal pa dang / shes rab
57a5(nyi khri): dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs bcu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
57a6(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad thub pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i pha rol tu phyin
57a7(nyi khri): pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes zhum pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
57b1(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa med pa dang // thogs//
57b2(nyi khri): pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni snying rje chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
57b3(nyi khri): stsal pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres
57b4(nyi khri): ba bco brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/
57b5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ brjod pa thams cad kyi de bzhin
57b6(nyi khri): nyid kyi phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang byung gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// chos
57b7(nyi khri): thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
58a1(nyi khri): stsal ba/ chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u nyi shu dgu
58a2(nyi khri): pa'o/ / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni
58a3(nyi khri): sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyer ba kun byas pa'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sems can gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o// shes
58a4(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sems can gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su gzung ba'o/ / gang 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed
58a5(nyi khri): pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed cing gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byas nas kyang / de bzhin nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du byed pa lta
58a6(nyi khri): ci smos te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs/ mi sdang / skrag par mi 'gyur ba de dag gis/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs
58a7(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yongs su dris so/ / yongs su zhus so// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
58b1(nyi khri): 'di thos nas mi 'jigs/ mi sdang / skrag par mi 'gyur la/ 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gis ni bskal pa
58b2(nyi khri): ba mang por/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de
58b3(nyi khri): snyam pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes
58b4(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas mi 'jigs/ mi sdang / skrag par mi 'gyur la/ 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid
58b5(nyi khri): pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang 'dra bar gzung bar bgyi'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
58b6(nyi khri): zab pa ste/ sngon pha rol tu phyin pa drag la ma spyad pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang mos par bgyi bar mi nus so// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu
58b7(nyi khri): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas spang bar sems pa de dag gis ni/ sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spad par gyur
59a1(nyi khri): to/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ dad pa dang
59a2(nyi khri): mos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sngon gyi mthar yang dag par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'
59a3(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos rnams la bsnyen bkur ma bgyis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang //
59a4(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi//
59a5(nyi khri): nang stong pa nyid la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom
59a6(nyi khri): par bgyi/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags
59a7(nyi khri): pa'i lam yan lag brkyang pa ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
59b1(nyi khri): par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
59b2(nyi khri): dang / mngon par shes pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
59b3(nyi khri): dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi zhes yongs su ma zhus/ yongs
59b4(nyi khri): su ma dris so/ / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
59b5(nyi khri): 'di ni shin tu zab na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ sngon ma spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mos par mi 'gyur ba lta ngo mtshar
59b6(nyi khri): yang ci che/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
59b7(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
60a1(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi bar dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnam da
60a2(nyi khri): / zugs med pa'i snyom par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting 'dzin rnams
60a3(nyi khri): dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang /
60a4(nyi khri): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mos par mi 'gyur ba lta ngo mtshar yang ci che/ btsun pa shA ra dwa
60a5(nyi khri): ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba'o//
60a6(nyi khri): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin te/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag
60a7(nyi khri): 'tshal ba ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad
60b1(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes las ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod do// ko'u shi ka thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes nyid la gnas par 'dod pa'i
60b2(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes bsgrub par 'dod pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor
60b3(nyi khri): ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar 'dod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o//
60b4(nyi khri): sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par
60b5(nyi khri): 'dod pa dang / rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol
60b6(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ / sems can rnams 'tshang rgya ba nyid la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o//
60b7(nyi khri): khams gsum gyi phul du gyur par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// bdud thams cad pham par bya bar 'dod pa'i
61a1(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// dge slong gi dge 'dun 'du bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am// rigs/
61a2(nyi khri): kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
61a3(nyi khri): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
61a4(nyi khri): phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags//
61a5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/
61a6(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi
61a7(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na nang stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la brtson par
61b1(nyi khri): bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams//
61b2(nyi khri): dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang
61b3(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar nA ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs
61b4(nyi khri): kyi sgo rnams la brtson par bgyid pa legs/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
61b5(nyi khri): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson par bgyid pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
61b6(nyi khri): stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de ltar khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di yongs su dri bar sems pa legs so legs so//
61b7(nyi khri): ko'u shi ka khyod kyis spobs pa 'di yang sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa las byung ngo // ko'u shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
62a1(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzugs la brtson par byed pa yin no// tshor ba
62a2(nyi khri): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed pa
62a3(nyi khri): yin no/ / mig la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe mig la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ mig la brtson par byed pa yin no// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la mi
62a4(nyi khri): gnas te/ gang gi tshe yid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ yid la brtson par byed pa yin no// gzugs la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe// gzugs
62a5(nyi khri): la brtson par byed pa yin no/ / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe chos la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ chos la brtson par byed pa yin no// /
62a6(nyi khri): mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi gnas/ mi gi 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lci dang /
62a7(nyi khri): lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi gnas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe yid kyi
62b1(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la brtson par byed pa yin no// sa'i khams la mi gnas te/ gang
62b2(nyi khri): gi tshe sa'i khams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ sa'i khams la brtson par byed pa yin no// chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams/
62b3(nyi khri): dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la brtson par byed pa yin no// /
62b4(nyi khri): ma rig pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe ma rig pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ ma rig pa la brtson par byed pa yin no// 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs
62b5(nyi khri): dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rga shi la mi gnas pa de'i
62b6(nyi khri): tshe/ rga shi la brtson par byed pa yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
62b7(nyi khri): brtson par byed pa yin no/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
63a1(nyi khri): ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas te/ gung gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/
63a2(nyi khri): brtson par byed pa yin no// nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no// dngos po med
63a3(nyi khri): ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
63a4(nyi khri): la brtson par byed pa yin no/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar gzhag
63a5(nyi khri): pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no/ / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan
63a6(nyi khri): lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam
63a7(nyi khri): yan lag brgyad pa la brtson par byed pa yin no/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
63b1(nyi khri): / 'jug pa rnams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtson par
63b2(nyi khri): byed pa yin no/ / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon
63b3(nyi khri): bar shes pa rnams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe mngon par shes pa rnams mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no// ting nge 'dzin rnams
63b4(nyi khri): dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs
63b5(nyi khri): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
