192b1(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// nang
192b2(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
192b3(nyi khri): kyi bar ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su

192b7(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'dres pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha
193a1(nyi khri): dang / phyi ma'i mthu' yongs su can pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o//
193a2(nyi khri): rab 'byor sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa 'dris chos thams cad yongs su chad pa ste/ rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma
193a3(nyi khri): mtha' yongs su chad pa gang yin pa de ni zhi ba'o/ / de ni bzang po'o// de ni yang dag pa ste/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid dang / dmigs su med pa dang / lam gyi rgyun chad

193a6(nyi khri): ngadag ston te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/
193a7(nyi khri): sems can rnams kyi gling du gyur pa yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
193b1(nyi khri): tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi snang bar gyur pa yin zhen/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po yun ring du ma rig pa'i
193b2(nyi khri): sgo nga'i sbubs kyi rab rib kyis kun nas dkris shing mun pas zil gyis non pa'i sems can rnams la shes rab kyis snang bar byed cing / gti mug gi mun pa dang / ma rig
193b3(nyi khri): pa'i mun nag dang / mi shes pa'i rab rib sel te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
193b4(nyi khri): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi snang bar gyur pa yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med
193b5(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams kyi sgron ma 'dzin cing 'od 'byin pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la
193b6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzog par sangs rgyas nas/ mdo sde pha rol tu phyin pa drug
193b7(nyi khri): dang ldan pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang ldan pa de dag gi don ma nor ba sems can rnams la yang dag par ston
194a1(nyi khri): sems can rnams kyang de la yang dag par skul zhing kun tu sbyor la gzhog cing rab tu 'god de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
194a2(nyi khri): dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams kyi sgron ma 'dzin cing 'od 'byon pa yin no//
194a3(nyi khri): rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/
194a4(nyi khri): sems can rnams kyi ded dpon du gyur pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
194a5(nyi khri): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams lam ngan par zhugs shing / tshul ma yin pa bzhi la zhen pa rnams la/ sems can rnam par dag
194a6(nyi khri): par bya ba'i don du mya ngan dang / gnod pa las yang dag par bzla ba dang / sdu bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba nub par bya ba dang / rig pa dang ldan par bya ba'i chos go/
194a7(nyi khri): bar bya ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir/ gcig la rten po'i lam ston te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na
194b1(nyi khri): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams kyi ded dpon du gyur pa yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar/
194b2(nyi khri): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams kyi
194b3(nyi khri): yongs su 'dren par gyur pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
194b4(nyi khri): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ gzugs skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir
194b5(nyi khri): chos ston to/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med
194b6(nyi khri): pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang /
194b7(nyi khri): kun nas don mo pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun na
195a1(nyi khri): nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
195a2(nyi khri): dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang

195a5(nyi khri): nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang
195a6(nyi khri): kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med
195a7(nyi khri): pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang
195b1(nyi khri): tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang
195b2(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgra
195b3(nyi khri): rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po
195b4(nyi khri): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos
195b5(nyi khri): ston to/ / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston
195b6(nyi khri): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
195b7(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub kyi bar du skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir chos ston to// rab 'byor

196b6(nyi khri): mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo zhes bya bar sems can rnams la chos ston to/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba med

198b7(nyi khri): dang bsnan pa med pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbri ba dang bsnan pa la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so//
199a1(nyi khri): rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'ong ba med pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'ong ba med pa
199a2(nyi khri): 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor chos thams cad ni blang ba dang dor ba med pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i
199a3(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/ blang ba dang dor ba med pa la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'phrad pa med pa dang / 'bral ba med pa dang

199a7(nyi khri): can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / byed du

199b7(nyi khri): ni sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor na
200a1(nyi khri): sdug pa nyid kyang shin tu mye nA/ de la 'gro ba gyu 'dra ba wA kA lta yod/ rab 'gyur chos thams cad ni 'dod chags kyi drung tshul ca
200a2(nyi khri): de dag ni dang rgyal de las mi 'dra'a'o/ / de d+ha'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'dod chags kyi dngos po nyid kya shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba ltags /
200a3(nyi khri): rab 'byor chos thams cad ni zhe sdang gi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'a'o// de ci'i phyir zhe nA/ rab 'byor zhe sdang gi dngos po nyid kyang
200a4(nyi khri): shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gti mug gi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni dang tshul de las mi 'da'a'o//
200a5(nyi khri): rdorje'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gti mug ni dngos po nyid kyang shin tu med nA/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lkug la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad no lta ba'i rnam
200a6(nyi khri): pa'o ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni dang tshul de las myi 'dra'a'o// de ci'i byor zhe na/ lta ba'i rnam pa'i dngos pa nyid kyang shin tu myed nA/ de la 'gro ba 'ama'o
200a7(nyi khri): ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de
200b1(nyi khri): bzhin nyid la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / bas/
200b2(nyi khri): gyis mi khyab pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la 'gro ba 'am
200b3(nyi khri): 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mo g.yo ba'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos
200b4(nyi khri): gang la yang g.yo ba med de/ 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gzugs kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'
200b5(nyi khri): 'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni tshor ba dang /

200b7(nyi khri): shes pa nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni
201a1(nyi khri): dang tshul de las mi 'du'a'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba
201a2(nyi khri): ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod po'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
201a3(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes
201a4(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni nang stong pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/
201a5(nyi khri): dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor
201a6(nyi khri): chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
201a7(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shin tu mi dmigs na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dran pa nye bar gzhag
201b1(nyi khri): ba'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang shin tu mi dmigs na/ de la 'gro
201b2(nyi khri): pa 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub
201b3(nyi khri): kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor lam nyid kyang shin tu mi dmigs na/ de la
201b4(nyi khri): 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
201b5(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
201b6(nyi khri): smyon pa med pa da / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so
201b7(nyi khri): so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las
202a1(nyi khri): 'da' 'o/ / de ci'abyor zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang shin tu mi dmyigs na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong bstuka/
202a2(nyi khri): la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
202a3(nyi khri): 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang shin tu mi dmigs na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
202a4(nyi khri): bu dang byor mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
202a5(nyi khri): rab 'byor rang byang chub nyid kyang shin tu med na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
202a6(nyi khri): chub kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nyid kyang shin tu rma
202a7(nyi khri): dmigs na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar zab pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la su zhig
202b1(nyi khri): mos par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
202b2(nyi khri): chub kyi spyod pa sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi drung du spyad par gyur pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ba
202b3(nyi khri): dge ba'i zo shes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba de dag shes rab kyi pha re rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ro/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong drag
202b4(nyi khri): nyi shu lnga pa las le'u sum cu drug pa'o/ / / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
202b5(nyi khri): phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur pa de dag gi rang bzhin ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi tshul dang / mtshan ma dang /
202b6(nyi khri): rnam pa ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
202b7(nyi khri): zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni/ 'dod chags rnam par gsal bas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
203a1(nyi khri): bo de dag ni zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnam par gsal bas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
203a2(nyi khri): dpa' chen po de dag ni 'dod chags kyi tshul gyis dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang /
203a3(nyi khri): gti mug gi tshul gyis dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'dod chags kyi mtshan mas dben pa'i
203a4(nyi khri): rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mtshan mas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur
203a5(nyi khri): ro/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'dod chags kyi rnam pas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems
203a6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag no zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi rnam pas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
203a7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag gi ngang tshul ji lta bur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das
203b1(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su shes par 'gyur ba de dag ni
203b2(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can du 'gyur ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad
203b3(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can de/ sems can rnams kyi rten du 'gyur ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no//
203b4(nyi khri): de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can ni sems can rnams kyi rten du 'gyur ba yin no//
203b5(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sems can rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes
203b6(nyi khri): go cha 'di 'tshal kyang de la sems can dang / sems can du gdags pa mi dmigs pa de dag ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
203b7(nyi khri): / rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las
204a1(nyi khri): bzla bar bya'o zhes gon 'di bgos pa de dag ni dka' ba byed pa'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni
204a2(nyi khri): gzugs dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de
204a3(nyi khri): ni gzugs dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
204a4(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'ang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/
204a5(nyi khri): de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni skye mched dang / khams
204a6(nyi khri): dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'ang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems
204a7(nyi khri): daraba'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor go cha de ni bdag dang 'brel pa ma yin
204b1(nyi khri): sems can dang 'brel ba ma yin/ srog dang 'brel ba ma yin+d+ra/ skye ba dang 'brel ba ma yin/ gso ba dang 'brel ba ma yin/ skyes bu dang 'brel ba ma yin//
204b2(nyi khri): gang zag dang 'brel pa ma yin/ shed can dang 'brel pa ma yin/ shed bdag dang 'brel pa ma yin/ byed pa po dang 'brel pa ma yin/ tshor ba po dang 'brel pa
204b3(nyi khri): ma yin/ shes pa po dang 'brel ba ma yin/ mthong ba po dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mthong ba po yang shin tu med la/ byang
204b4(nyi khri): chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni mthong ba po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
204b5(nyi khri): po'i go cha de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang shin tu med la/ byang chub
204b6(nyi khri): sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
204b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
205a1(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel bu ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol
205a2(nyi khri): tu phyin pa yang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//
205a3(nyi khri): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni nang stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid kyang
205a4(nyi khri): shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni nang stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems
205a5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
205a6(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes
205a7(nyi khri): bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dran pa nye bar
205b1(nyi khri): / gzhag pa yang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub
205b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam
205b3(nyi khri): yan lag brgyad pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas//
205b4(nyi khri): de'i phyir go cha de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad
205b5(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas
205b6(nyi khri): de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
205b7(nyi khri): ' di la spyod pa gang dag sems can thams cad bdag cag gis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha bgos pa de dag gi go cha de ni chos thams cad dang 'brel pa ma
206a1(nyi khri): yin no/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las
206a2(nyi khri): bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba des nyam thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad
206a3(nyi khri): yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung ba'i gnas
206a4(nyi khri): dang skabs ma mchis te/ de ni ga nA ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa mtshams bcad de
206a5(nyi khri): sems can gyi don du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyis don gyi dbang gang zhig mthong na de skad du/ byang
206a6(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha bgos shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i
206a7(nyi khri): gnas gnyis su dogs par mi bya'o zhes smras/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dra de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can nyi tshe nyung zad cig gi don
206b1(nyi khri): du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags/ ye shes nyung zad nyi tshe zhig gi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
206b2(nyi khri): po ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du go cha 'tshal to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
206b3(nyi khri): ye shes kyi slad du go cha 'tshal to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po no sems cam nyung zad
206b4(nyi khri): tshe'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin gyi/ ye shes nyung zad nyi tshe'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can thams cad yongs su
206b5(nyi khri): mya ngan las bzla ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi don du go cha bgos so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shin tu zab pa ste/ de ni sus kyang
206b6(nyi khri): bsgom par mi bgyi/ ci yang bsgom par mi bgyi/ gang du yang bsgom par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gang
206b7(nyi khri): bsgom pa 'am/ gang la bsgom par bgyi ba 'am/ gang gis bsgom par bgyi ba'i chos gang yang yongs su grub pa dmigs su ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha
207a1(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni nam mkha' sgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byon pa bsgom pa de ni chos thams cad
207a2(nyi khri): sgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni ma mchis bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
207a3(nyi khri): tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa sgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o//
207a4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa de gang sgom pa rnam par sgom pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
207a5(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'dra
207a6(nyi khri): ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
207a7(nyi khri): 'di ni skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
207b1(nyi khri): 'di ni bdag sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro
207b2(nyi khri): pab dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po sgom
207b3(nyi khri): pa rnam par sgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan
207b4(nyi khri): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
207b5(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
207b6(nyi khri): nang stong pa nyid sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sgom pa
207b7(nyi khri): rnam par sgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
208a1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 2/
208a2(nyi khri): sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
208a3(nyi khri): tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam
208a4(nyi khri): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom pa
208a5(nyi khri): rnam par sgom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
208a6(nyi khri): so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
208a7(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
208b1(nyi khri): pa 'di ni lan cig zir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / drir mo 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyi sgom pa rnam par skom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'ang
208b2(nyi khri): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
208b3(nyi khri): 'byor de de bzhin no/ / de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
208b4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
208b5(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
208b6(nyi khri): bsgom pa 'di ni bdag sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba
208b7(nyi khri): dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / sheng can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o//
209a1(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor
209a2(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni stong pa nyid thams cad sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
209a3(nyi khri): bsgom pa 'di ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di no 'phags pa'i bden pa
209a4(nyi khri): dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
209a5(nyi khri): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste
209a6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'dzegs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa
209a7(nyi khri): chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
209b1(nyi khri): pa 'di ni rnam pa tham cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad rjes
209b2(nyi khri): bka' stsal to/ / rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ rab 'byor shes
209b3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
209b4(nyi khri): po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
209b5(nyi khri): phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi
209b6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
209b7(nyi khri): nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ dngos po med pa'i ngo sa
210a1(nyi khri): cing stong pa yod la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mngon par chags pa med/
210a2(nyi khri): dam zhes/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang /
210a3(nyi khri): tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
210a4(nyi khri): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ gzungs
210a5(nyi khri): kyi sgo rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
210a6(nyi khri): bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brjod la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
210a7(nyi khri): rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par makra ba med dam zhes/ rnam pa thams cad
210b1(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
210b2(nyi khri): 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol gyis smras pa dang / pha rol gyis bstan pa la snying por mi lta 'am/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab
210b3(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol gyi dad pas mi 'gro 'am/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
210b4(nyi khri): mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pa sa 'phrog pa ma yin na ma/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang / gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas
210b5(nyi khri): 'phrog pa ma yin nam/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
210b6(nyi khri): ba dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur ta ma/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
210b7(nyi khri): byin pa dang bral bar ma gyur ta ma/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam zhes yongs su brtag par
211a1(nyi khri): Tha9/ bal te phyir ma spros pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di na pa'i na/ ni 'jigs mi sdang skrag par rma/
211a2(nyi khri): 'gyur la/ rnam pa dang yongs su zhum pa'i 'gyur zhing deni yid phyir nur bar mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'ad thos par dka' dka' la sa
211a3(nyi khri): nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang la klog cing kun chub par byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de bzhin du nan tan du byed na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des
211a4(nyi khri): ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su dris shing yongs su brtag par byas pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs te bklag cing kun chub par byas pa dang /
211a5(nyi khri): tshul bzhin du yid la byas par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
211a6(nyi khri): 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi dadang skrag par mi 'gyur la/ zhum par mi 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / de'i yid phyir mi ldog la/ thos
211a7(nyi khri): nas kyang khong du chud cing 'chang la klog cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
211b1(nyi khri): chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur zhing zhum par mi 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur na/
211b2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ji ltar brtag par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
211b3(nyi khri): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtag par bya'o/ / gsol
211b4(nyi khri): p abacom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la
211b5(nyi khri): rtog pa lags/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
211b6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / skye
211b7(nyi khri): med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i
212a1(nyi khri): @/ tsas pa ma / ga su / A ts+tshas+yA
212a2(nyi khri): ba'i bsam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/
212a3(nyi khri): rmi lam dang / gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / sgra brnyan dang / smig rgyu dang / b+h+yA ma dang / sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems
212a4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi ba tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin no/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa bam po zhe dgu pa//
212a5(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur
212a6(nyi khri): zhing mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa dang / nam mkha' ma mchis pa dang / skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang
212a7(nyi khri): kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mnyam pa
212b1(nyi khri): nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / rmi lam dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sgra brnyan dang / smig rgyu dang / skye
212b2(nyi khri): ma dang / sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la rtog
212b3(nyi khri): pa lags sam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par
212b4(nyi khri): 'byung ba la rtog pa lags sam/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la rtog pa lags sam/
212b5(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang
212b6(nyi khri): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang
212b7(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi zho rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
213a1(nyi khri): rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
213a2(nyi khri): kyi bar la rtog pa lags sam/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no// tshor
213a3(nyi khri): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rtog pa ma yin
213a4(nyi khri): no/ / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la rtog pa ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang
213a5(nyi khri): bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
213a6(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang
213a7(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang
213b1(nyi khri): rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rtog pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni
213b2(nyi khri): 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sus kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang du yang ma song / phyogs na yang mi dmigs pa de
213b3(nyi khri): ni yul na yang mi gnas/ gang na yang mi gnas pa ste/ de la grangs mi dmigs so// 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba yang mi dmigs so// gang la grangs mi dmigs shing /
213b4(nyi khri): 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba yang mi dmigs pa de ni gang gis kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par mi nus te/ gzugs kyis ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed
213b5(nyi khri): dang / rnam par shes pas ma yin no// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas ma yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no// tshul khrims
213b6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pasam
213b7(nyi khri): yin no/ / nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis ma yin no// yang
214a1(nyi khri): dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi san lag rnams dang / 'phags/
214a2(nyi khri): ba'i lam yan lag brgyad pas ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
214a3(nyi khri): nyid do/ / tshor ba nyid dang / 'du shes nyid dang / 'du byed nyid dang / rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
214a4(nyi khri): 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
214a5(nyi khri): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin
214a6(nyi khri): ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin
214a7(nyi khri): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kang
214b1(nyi khri): yin pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /
214b2(nyi khri): bas ma gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i
214b3(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge
214b4(nyi khri): 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de zhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//
214b5(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
214b6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//
214b7(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u sum cu bdun pa'o// / de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa/
215a1(nyi khri): lha'i bu rnams lU rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu dang / pur+t+ta r-i ka mang po khyer te/
215a2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su 'thor bar gyur to// gtor nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de'i dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas
215a3(nyi khri): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / 'khod nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod par spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
215a4(nyi khri): ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las/ 'di skad du gzugs nyid rnam la thams
215a5(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
215a6(nyi khri): pab ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
215a7(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rten cing 'bel bar 'byung ba'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin
215b1(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
215b2(nyi khri): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyin rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'o// rnam pa sems cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nang stong pa ca nus pa thams
215b3(nyi khri): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
215b4(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar
215b5(nyi khri): gzhag pa'o/ / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
215b6(nyi khri): brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam
215b7(nyi khri): gtan dang / tshad med pa'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa le/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa
216a1(nyi khri): 'jug pa'o/ / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
216a2(nyi khri): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang
216a3(nyi khri): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
216a4(nyi khri): pa'o/ / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su
216a5(nyi khri): med cing gnyis su byar med do/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
216a6(nyi khri): tsi gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcin pa 'o/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin
216a7(nyi khri): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de na de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//
216b1(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing
216b2(nyi khri): gnyis su byar med do/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
216b3(nyi khri): dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste//
216b4(nyi khri): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gci
216b5(nyi khri): pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
216b6(nyi khri): nyid gang yin pa de ni/ / de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
216b7(nyi khri): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang
217a1(nyi khri): dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i 'am yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams ca
217a2(nyi khri): khyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa de/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang
217a3(nyi khri): tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig
217a4(nyi khri): ba ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
217a5(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgro dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'ju/
217a6(nyi khri): pabazhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
217a7(nyi khri): ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang
217b1(nyi khri): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi
217b2(nyi khri): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do zhes s+ho//
217b3(nyi khri): ba ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zab cing blta dka' la/ khong du chud par dka' zhing rtag tu ma mchis la/ rtog
217b4(nyi khri): ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa ste/ zhi zhing phra ba zhib mo mkhas shing rtogs pas rig par bgyi ba ste/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi sa yid ches par dka' ba'o//
217b5(nyi khri): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu dag de de bzhin
217b6(nyi khri): no/ / de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang
217b7(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel
218a1(nyi khri): par 'byung ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rten cing 'brel 'byung ba'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa
218a2(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
218a3(nyi khri): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
218a4(nyi khri): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
218a5(nyi khri): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams
218a6(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa ste/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa che bar gzhag pa'o// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang /
218a7(nyi khri): byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa tha ma cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o//
218b1(nyi khri): 'phanas pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
218b2(nyi khri): / cinyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o// rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
218b3(nyi khri): med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang
218b4(nyi khri): so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad ma
218b5(nyi khri): pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o/ / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
218b6(nyi khri): de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
218b7(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing nanyis su byar med do// skye mched dang / khams dang /
219a1(nyi khri): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
219a2(nyi khri): gnyis su med ming gnyis su thar med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mtshan pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang yin pa de ni
219a3(nyi khri): de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi
219a4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol nu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyi
219a5(nyi khri): gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
219a6(nyi khri): tshad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid bcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin
219a7(nyi khri): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dran pa
219b1(nyi khri): bar gzhan pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa den/ de bzhin nyid gcig bste/ gnyis su med cing nas
219b2(nyi khri): su byar med de/ / yang dag par 'aspong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan
219b3(nyi khri): lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su
219b4(nyi khri): byar med do/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang
219b5(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rnam par thar pa dang / mthar tsas sa
219b6(nyi khri): ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge
219b7(nyi khri): 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang
220a1(nyi khri): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/
220a2(nyi khri): bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
220a3(nyi khri): / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
220a4(nyi khri): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lha'i bu dag don gyi dbang de gzigs pas/ de bzhin
220a5(nyi khri): gshegs pa 'phrin las chung ba la thugs gzhol te/ chos bstan pa la gzhol ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos byang chub
220a6(nyi khri): 'di ni zab cing lta dka' la/ khong du chud par dka' zhing brtag tu med la/ rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin te/ zhi zhing phra ba zhib mo mkhas shing rtog pas rig par bya ba/ 'jig
220a7(nyi khri): rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba ste/ de ni sus kyang mngon par sangs ma rgyas/ nam yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas/ gar yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas te/ gang la
220b1(nyi khri): gnyis su kun nas rgyu ba med pa de ni chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid do/ / lha'i bu dag nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//
220b2(nyi khri): lha'i bu dag ches kyi dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zab pa
220b3(nyi khri): phyir chos 'di zab bo/ / lha'i bu dag mtha' yas mu med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag
220b4(nyi khri): mi skye mi 'gag pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par
220b5(nyi khri): rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ / lha'i bu dag mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di/
220b6(nyi khri): zab bo// lha'i bu dag bdag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab pa'o// sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang // skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / she
220b7(nyi khri): can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang shes pa po dang / mthong ba po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lnga'i bu dag gzugs zab pa'i phyir rlo/
221a1(nyi khri): zab bo// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag skye mched dang / khams dang /
221a2(nyi khri): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa na
221a3(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// nang stong
221a4(nyi khri): pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di
221a5(nyi khri): zab bo/ / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
221a6(nyi khri): zab pa'i pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ / lha'i bu dag 'phags pa'i bden pa dang // bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zab pa'i phyir
221a7(nyi khri): chos 'di zab bo/ / lha'i bu dag rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
221b1(nyi khri): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang
221b2(nyi khri): byarnams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa'i phyir
221b3(nyi khri): chos 'di zab bo/ / lha'i bu rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba'i chos bstan pa ni ngo mtshar to//
221b4(nyi khri): ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni gzugs gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang
221b5(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gzung ba'i slad du bstan
221b6(nyi khri): pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags
221b7(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
222a1(nyi khri): 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang
222a2(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
222a3(nyi khri): 'dres pa bco brgyad gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ chos zab mo 'di rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags//
222a4(nyi khri): mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lagasalan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang /
222a5(nyi khri): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
222a6(nyi khri): 'jig rten ni bdag gi gzugs so/ / bdag ni gzugs can no// bdag gi tshor ba'o// bdag gis tshor bar bya'o// bdag gi 'du shes so// bdag ni 'du shes can no// bdag
222a7(nyi khri): gi 'du byed do/ / bdag gis mngon par 'du bya'o// bdag gi rnam par shes par bya'o// bdag gis rnam par shes par bya'o// bdag gi skye mched dang / khams dang / rten gyi
222b1(nyi khri): 'brel par 'byung ba'o/ / bdag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos can no// bdag na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
222b2(nyi khri): par bya'o/ / bdag gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i// bdag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// bdag gi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
222b3(nyi khri): bdag gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// bdag gi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bdag gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
222b4(nyi khri): yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ / bdag gi bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bdag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// bdag kau shes rab tukyi
222b5(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// bdag gi ning stong pa nyid do// bdag gis nang stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o//
222b6(nyi khri): dag gi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ro// bdag gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o// bdag gi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// bdag
222b7(nyi khri): gis dran pa che bar gzhag pa la spyad par bya'o/ / bdag gi yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan pa
223a1(nyi khri): dang / 'phags pa'i las yan lan brgyad pa'o// bdag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lan bcad pa la spyad par bya'o// 'dan na 'phags pa'i bden pa dang
223a2(nyi khri): byas ma gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang
223a3(nyi khri): stong panyid da/ mtshan ma myen pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin nga/ gzungs kyi zhe// bdag gi gzung
223a4(nyi khri): laM spyad par bya'o/ / bdag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang
223a5(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o/ / bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la spyad par bya'o// bdag gi rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// bdag ni rgyun du zhugs par 'gyur
223a6(nyi khri): ro/ / bdag gi lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bdag ni lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdag gi phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bral bu'o// bdag ni phyir mi 'ong bar
223a7(nyi khri): 'gyur ro/ / bdag gi dgra bcom pa nyid do// bdag ni dgra bcom pa nyid du 'gyur ro// bdag gi rang byang chub zo// bdag ni rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// bdag gi rnam
223b1(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ro zhes bgyi bar 'dzin pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
223b2(nyi khri): lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag chos 'di ni gzugs gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes
223b3(nyi khri): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin// mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par
223b4(nyi khri): 'byung ba gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
223b5(nyi khri): sumi cu rtsa bdun gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med
223b6(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
223b7(nyi khri): med pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stos
224a1(nyi khri): dang / mi 'dzinas pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gzung
224a2(nyi khri): ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ga zung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin no//
224a3(nyi khri): lha'i bu dag gang yang gzugs gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
224a4(nyi khri): shes pa gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir
224a5(nyi khri): spyod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i
224a6(nyi khri): phyir spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis
224a7(nyi khri): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang
224b1(nyi khri): / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen/
224b2(nyi khri): po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung ba'i phyir ram/
224b3(nyi khri): mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa de dag gis ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par mi nus so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
224b4(nyi khri): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par mi nus so// nang stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so//
224b5(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom par mi nus so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom par mi nus so// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
224b6(nyi khri): rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par mi nus so// rnam pa
224b7(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom par mi nus so/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
225a1(nyi khri): chos 'di ni chos thams cad dang rjes su mthun pa ste/ chos 'di ni chos gang rnams dang rjes su mthun pa lags she na/ chos 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
225a2(nyi khri): ba dang rjes su mthun pa'o/ / chos 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims
225a3(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o// chos 'di ni nang stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o// chos 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
225a4(nyi khri): nyid kyi bar dang rjes su mthun pa'o/ / chos 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o// chos 'di ni yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
225a5(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o//
225a6(nyi khri): chos 'do na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam
225a7(nyi khri): par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o//
225b1(nyi khri): chos 'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams
225b2(nyi khri): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o//
225b3(nyi khri): chos 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang rjes su mthun pa'o// chos 'di ni gang la yang thogs pa ma mchis pa ste/ ci la thogs pa ma mchis pa lags
225b4(nyi khri): she na/ gzugs la thogs pa ma mchis so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis so// skye mched dang
225b5(nyi khri): khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la thogs pa ma mchis so// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu
225b6(nyi khri): rtsa 'dun la thogs pa ma mchis so/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug rnams dang
225b7(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la thogs pa ma mchis so//
226a1(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa
226a2(nyi khri): rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so//
226a3(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la thogs pa ma mchis so// chos 'di ni nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi mnyam
226a4(nyi khri): pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i mnyam pa nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
226a5(nyi khri): mnyam pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa
226a6(nyi khri): mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du thogs pa mchis pa'i mtshan nyid do/ / chos 'di ni gzugs kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
226a7(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang
226b1(nyi khri): stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa 'dun gyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa
226b2(nyi khri): dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang
226b3(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
226b4(nyi khri): stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
226b5(nyi khri): pa bco brgyad kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba mi dmigs pa'i skad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o// chos 'di ni gzugs
226b6(nyi khri): kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / nor 'dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rten mo dmigs pa dang / skye mched dang / khams dang
226b7(nyi khri): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyirten rmi
227a1(nyi khri): dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par
227a2(nyi khri): thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rten mo dmigs pa dang
227a3(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'dzags pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams
227a4(nyi khri): ba chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rten mi dmigs pa'i
227a5(nyi khri): slad du rten ma mchis pa'o/ / de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
227a6(nyi khri): gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su skyes so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni ci ston pa de dag thams cad stong pa nyid las
227a7(nyi khri): brtsams shing ston to/ / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang // smon pa ma mchis pa las brtsams shing ston to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ 'dod pa
227b1(nyi khri): na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu dag gang 'di skad du// bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
227b2(nyi khri): pa'i rjes su skyes so zhes zer ba ni/ ji ltar rjes su skyes pas gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin zhe na/ gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs
227b3(nyi khri): pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su skyes pa ste/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ma 'ongs ma song ba de bzhin du/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang ma 'ongs ma song
227b4(nyi khri): bas na/ thog ma nas gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid
